content: this cotton soap saver bag is the perfect sustainable accessory for your bar soap and just like washcloth the woven texture will gently exfoliate your skin when you are finished give it a quick rinse and hang it up the bag and the soap will dry easily enjoy this easy and beginner-friendly soap saver pattern finished size 4 x 6 but the size can be easily adjusted designed in medium worsted weight 100 % cotton yarn and requires 4 25 mm g crochet hook thank you very much for visiting my shop i hope you will enjoy my designs please follow me on facebook/instagram @esthershands if you have any questions esthershands@gmail com happy crocheting eszter
